meanings.definition: In a generous or liberal manner.
meanings.sent1: She openhandedly donated money to the charity.
meanings.sent2: He always gives openhandedly to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The openhandedly wealthy man bought everyone in the restaurant dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat openhandedly, overflowing with kindness.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone openhandedly, warming all in its path.

meanings.definition: With a willingness to give or share freely.
meanings.sent1: The shop owner openhandedly offered discounts to loyal customers.
meanings.sent2: They welcomed the new neighbors openhandedly, inviting them over for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The magician openhandedly shared his secrets with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed openhandedly, nourishing the surrounding land.
meanings.sent5: The teacher smiled openhandedly, encouraging her students to do their best.
